item.title: Report E-2024090132
item.description:
Report E-2024090132

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-12T09:14:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-09
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that a 1-gallon poly jug of UN3266 Meyer Component P was crushed due to a faulty pallet from the shipper causing approximately 1-quart to release on the dock. The damaged jug and absorbents were placed into a 55-gallon poly drum for disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024090128
item.description:
Report E-2024090128

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-12T09:14:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-08
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 2-tablespoons of GE Locomotive flushing solvent released from a metal tote due to the tote lid being loose. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable tightening the lid and cleaning the release with the available PPE onsite.
